title: Miele : global revenue 2006/07 to 2017/18
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in billion euros. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall Revenue in billion euros has increased over the Year.

Revenue in billion euros is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2009/10, slightly increasing from 2009/10 to 2011/12, roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2013/14, and finally gradually increasing from 2013/14 to 2017/18.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013/14 and 2014/15.
The highest Revenue in billion euros, of value 4.1 was reached at Year 2017/18
Minimum Revenue in billion euros about 2.74 was reached at Year 2006/07
